content:
### Enhanced nodes


* [Grist:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.grist.md) Added support for self-hosted Grist instances.
* [Telegram Trigger:](/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegramtrigger/index.md) Added new Extra Large option to Image Size field.
* [Webhook:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/index.md) Added new No Response Body option. Also added support for DELETE, PATCH and PUT methods.
